DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : JAPAN
DOC.TEXT: Imported Vehicle Sales Up 26 % : Sales of_imported cars , trucks and buses in Japan soared in February from the year-earlier month to 17 # 812 units , the Japan Automobile Importers Assn . reported . The sharp increase in February came as an extension of the recent rise in foreign car sales in Japan , which are boosted largely by lower prices resulting from the appreciation of the yen against the dollar and other major currencies .
